title: Test: Ntfy on Story Completion
description: Write tests for story completion notifications from MP-132.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Test: notifyStoryComplete sends correct title format
Test: body includes story title, model, next story
Test: storyCompleted flag set when story moves to completed
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: test: TEST-132 ntfy story completion tests
